ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2001_01_10: Let’s try not to go too hard today.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2002_01_10: How are you doing? As for me...nothing new.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Hello there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I was hoping I might run into you.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2101_01_10:
Please accept this as a token of our
camaraderie.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2101_02_10: I’m sure it’ll be of use.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
I found this while out on my rounds.
You can have it.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2102_02_10: I hope we can continue working together.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
Thank you for your continued support.
Please, take this.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2103_02_10: The only gifts I can offer are ordinary things.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2103_03_10: But I hope you like it, even just a little.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2201_01_10: A chat? I suppose I don’t mind.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
You must be quite curious to want to talk
with me, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I suppose I could tell you about some of the
good eats I’ve found on Pasio.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2302_01_10: You’re giving me this? You shouldn’t have.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2301_02_10: What an exquisite gift. How thoughtful.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
Oh, it’s time. While I hate to leave,
I must be off.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2401_01_10: I became a little engrossed in our chat.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
I’d like to talk again sometime. Maybe over
a nice meal.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
This space was made for relaxation,
so I wouldn’t want to ruin the mood by
bringing my work here.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
Let’s forget about work and bosses for now
and just take it easy.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
You want to know a trick to finishing work
quickly? Hmm...
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
This may be a boring answer, but I don’t try
to do that. I just work normally and wrap it
up as usual.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
Hm? You say now you understand why I’m
called the Exceptional Everyman?
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8003_0701_01_10: It’s surprisingly difficult to be average.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8003_0701_02_10: Society demands constant change, after all.
ch0304_00_aoki_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
To live an ordinary day-to-day life,
one must put in more effort than the
average person.
